loginUrl:
{"ui": [{"name": "userName","type": "text"},{"name": "password","type": "password"}],"url": "https://www.kaixin7days.com/login@{\"telephone\":\"{{telephone}}\",\"password\":\"{{password}}\"}","checkJs": "var a = result\
var c = JSON.parse(result.body())\
if (c.statusCode == 301) {\
    var b = java.getResponse(\"https://www.kaixin7days.com/visitorLogin@{}\").body()\
    c = JSON.parse(b)\
    var accessToken = {\
        Authorization: \"Bearer \" + c.content.accessToken\
    }\
    var header = JSON.stringify(accessToken)\
    java.putLoginHeader(header)\
    a = java.getResponse(\"@Header:\" + header + url)\
}\
a"}
